outline:
1. first, primary, former
    1. former (of time)
      1. ancestors
      2. former things
    2. foremost (of location)
    3. first (in time)
    4. first, chief (in degree)
  2. first, before, formerly, at first
kjv_def: ancestor, (that were) before(-time), beginning, eldest, first, fore(-father) (-most), former (thing), of old time, past.
strongs_def: first, in place, time or rank (as adjective or noun)
